io.wcm.qa.glnm.sampling.htmlcleaner

Class HtmlCleanerSampler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.wcm.qa.glnm.sampling.base.CachingBasedSampler<O>
      • io.wcm.qa.glnm.sampling.transform.base.TransformationBasedSampler<JDS,D,O>
        • io.wcm.qa.glnm.sampling.jsoup.base.JsoupElementBasedSampler<JsoupDocumentSampler,org.jsoup.nodes.Document,String>
          • io.wcm.qa.glnm.sampling.jsoup.JsoupRawStringSampler
            • io.wcm.qa.glnm.sampling.htmlcleaner.HtmlCleanerSampler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CachingSampler<String>, CanCache, Sampler<String>, TransformingSampler<JsoupDocumentSampler,org.jsoup.nodes.Document,String>

    public class HtmlCleanerSampler
extends JsoupRawStringSampler
    Uses HTML cleaner to tidy up HTML samples fetched with Jsoup.
    Since:
    3.0.0
